[data-input-repeat-remove]: inline bg-red-500 text-white p-2 rounded cursor-pointer
[data-input-repeat-up]: inline bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded cursor-pointer
[data-input-repeat-down]: inline bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded cursor-pointer
[data-input-repeat-create-new-line]: m-3 inline bg-green-500 text-white p-2 rounded cursor-pointer
.submit-button: m-3  bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded cursor-pointer
